thread.title: Pandora signs $90 million truce with the recording industry
thread.title_full: Pandora signs $90 million truce with the recording industry

title: Pandora signs $90 million truce with the recording industry
text:
Pandora signs $90 million truce with the recording industry 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Thanks to a quirk of copyright law, songs recorded before February 15th, 1972 weren't covered at the federal level. It's a loophole of sorts...
